feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13 except minus 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 13 except minus 7 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 05 January 2023
